item.title: Revault Bitcoin vaults
item.description: Aaron: So you guys built something. First tell me are you a company? Is this a startup? What is the story here? Kevin: My personal interest in vaults started last year when Bryan Bishop published his email on the mailing list. I was like “That is an interesting concept.” After that I started engaging with him on Twitter proposing a few different ideas. There were some limitations and some attacks around it.
